She spoke good english and offered me a seat and some mint tea to relax, I then decided I would go for a hammam to relax some more while I was waiting for the guy to go away. It was an amazing experience, which I repeated a few days later. I left feeling fresh and chilled, it was a new experience standing there in g-string (i didnt have any swimming shorts) getting washed, exfoliated and moisturised but it was awesome. This place is a haven in Marrakech, I only wish I could have tried the massage aswel. Excellent service in a tranquil environment. Thank you to the staff and the lady on reception who was very helpful.

Amazing hammam!! Highly recommended! . Attended this amazing hammam at the beginning of December and had a absolutely fabulous time! I can't recommend this place highly enough, if you have a chance to go, make sure you do - you'll love it! Many thanks to Bouchra and the staff, extremely professional and helpful. I'll definitely be going back next time.

Pure Bliss. If you want to relax then look no further this place was very welcoming and very clean, not only are the staff pleasant and helpful the treatments are pure relaxtion. Try the hammam and then a massage after that ask if you can sit up on the terrace and enjoy the sun . Would stronly recommend you ty this hammam before you go elsewhere you wont regret it.
amazing. It may be more pricey but it is luxourious,.friendly, and the products are lovely , I keep smelling my hair its delicious, I would recommend

Hammam De La Rose. Absolutely amazing place! Treatments were out of this world! I would highly recommend, everyone try this place. Everyone who worked there, were great and very welcoming! I would definitely go again!!

Definately one to try!. My sister, my mum and I went on the last day of our trip to Marrakech, it was the most perfect way to end it. We went for the hammam plus half hour massage; everyone was very nice and made us feel very comfortable and relaxed as it was our first time. The whole feel and decor was beautiful, we would all love to go again! Bliss!
relaxing experience!. lovely staff, fantastic environment, completely relaxed, we really enjoyed it! a peacefull place in the old city center

Lovely first Hammam experience at de la Rose. My mom and I went to Hammam la Rose last week. It was our first Hammam experience and we choose the Imperial Morocco treatment, followed by the Relaxing Oriental massage and a pedicure. The atmosphere at la Rose is very relaxing. We got to do treatment together, which was a big plus. We went to another Hammam earlier that week, where we booked two back massages, but we couldn't do those massages in the same room. The staff escorted us from the Hammam room to the relaxing room (where we got a cup of mint tea) and later to the massage room. We didn't see any other people, so it really made us feel like all the attention was focussed on us. The only point of improvement that we saw, was that the staff (except for the hostess) was a bit blunt. They did not smile or talk very often, for instance explain the steps of the hammam process. Overall it was a lovely first hammam experience, and we would definetly recommend la Rose to our friend who are going to Marrakech.
Just go for it! . Excellent treatments. No nonsense yet very relaxed. Nice to be able to enjoy it together with my husband. Feel sooo clean now!
Hammam De La Rose. The experiencing of “Hammam de la rose” was one of the best souvenirs I brought back from Marrakesh for myself.

Fantastic experience. My sister and I had the ceremonies de la rose treatment. It was a truly wonderful experience, really relaxing and the staff were very nice. It was totally different from anything I have experienced anywhere else in the world. The internal environment of the spa was beautiful and soothing. I'd definitely recommend!

Enjoyable experience. We thoroughly enjoyed this experience. Definitely different for a westerner. But it was fun and interesting. And very well priced when you compare to the price of a regular massage in Canada. I definitely recommend giving this a try as it is a unique and enjoyable experience.

Hammam de la Rose experience. I went to Hammam de la Rose with my friends. We had the Imperial Moroccan treatment. I loved it as well as my friends did. The customer service was great customer service. I truly felt I travelled back in time when stepped into the steam room. I enjoyed the treatment very much and did not want it to end. After the treatment I felt refreshed and relaxed. My skin looked great. Would love to go there again!

An Absolute Chill Out. Wow.... contemporary & relaxing Hammam run by a professional team, making my wife and I feel at ease within minutes of getting started. The black soap scrub down, followed by the heady scents of cinnamon and lemon verbena set us up nicely for the great massage to follow. Left De La Rose perfectly chilled and ready to take on the airport! Best thing we've done in 3 days.

Lovely hammam. I was recommended two hammams by my Riad and visited Hammam de la Rose first. It was a lovely first experience to a hammam, I had the ceremonie package which included the black glove scrub, face & body exfoliator, my hair washed and massage. Jamila, the lady who scrubbed was excellent & made me very comfortable straight away. The massage was also lovely - if you prefer firmer pressure then ask up front. This hammam is small, has a personalised service & is very relaxing - I wasn't rushed at all.

Lorna Mc - A must do in Marrakech. We were washed, oiled, left in a sauna, washed again, oiled, scrubbed, washed and massaged from head to foot. A truly wonderful experience that must be done. The facility was clean, attractively decorated and the staff, although not much English spoken, we're friendly and professional

Lovely except for one thing. Had a ceremonie de la rose which was good and my massage lady had good pressure but the only problem was that as she was massaging the bottom of my foot as I was lying on my front, she was using her mobile phone and I presume was texting ,she was doing very slow circles with one hand for quite a while!! I do believe that mobile phones should not be allowed to be used by therapists in a massage room, it is very unprofessional, I am a massage therapist myself and would never entertain taking my phone in the room while I was doing a massage. Otherwise it was all good!

"Don't Leave Marrakech without Visiting Here". We expected a nice, comfortable and enjoyable massage. What we got instead was great value for money and a memorable and truly remarkable experience. We did their signature bath and massage. The therapists assigned to us were remarkably skilled. They gave us a hot bath and a hot scrub, peppered us with all sorts of wonderful bath scents from caramel to flower scents. A sauna came next then the exfoliating scrub. A little rest at a lounge area followed with Moroccan mint tea and cold bottled water. Then came a most unforgettable massage. We felt so clean, light and happy after the entire experience. Don't leave Marrakech without experiencing this.

Great experience. My husband and I enjoyed a Hammam Berber together here. We have never had one before so have no frame of reference for comparison, however both really enjoyed it. The 2 ladies were very professional and my husband soon forgot his paper thong! We both came away thoroughly scrubbed and enjoy the relaxing tea and cookies after. Very easy to find from where the cab driver dropped us off. Would recommend.

Body Scrub of a Lifetime!. We were told about the body scrub at Hammam de la Rose by some friends at our bed and breakfast. After securing a reservation – we were welcomed by a wonderful staff. The treatment areas were very clean and the body scrub was something out of this world. By American standards – it’s pretty great to have someone give you an exfoliating scrub, rinse you off and then moisturize you! After the body scrub, we were offered the traditional Moroccan Mint tea and then a full body massage. After walking the streets of Marrakech all day – this was a fitting way to relax and experience the spa culture of Morocco!
Very relaxing and topservice. My compliments for both the massage as the hamman. Great ambiance and perfect service. Very nice and helpfull Italian owner and superclean!

Weird but surprising relaxing!. My boyfriend and I thought we would try out the hammam experience together. We weren't to sure what you expect and so we were very surprised when we were asked to undress and wear paper pants! Although we started out by feeling a little uncomfortable, the staff were very professional and this helped us to relax. The black soap scrub was very good and my skin felt soft afterwards. It felt a little strange to be washed by someone else at first but we relaxed after a while. The massage was relaxing but not hard. Mint tea and biscuits were a nice touch.

Lovely, relexaing Moroccon experience. My mum, sister, friend and I went to this spa and it was really lovely. I had a great back massage which went way too quickly! It was lovely, although it wasn't a deep or therapeutic massage, it was very relaxing. The staff were very kind and friendly. My mum and friend had a hammam and felt cleaner than they ever have before! All in all a great experience that I would recommend to anyone wanting a relaxing day.

Peaceful Oasis. A wonderful relaxing way to unwind after the hustle and bustle of visiting the Souks. We were transported away on a waft of perfume and soothing music, whilst having a classic Hamman experience of scrubbing and oiling. The staff were all very welcoming to us first timers. We came out gliding in more than one sense of the word.Well worth every Dirham.

Great first experience of a hammam. This place is very professional and accommodating to first timers to a hammam. Obviously not a true experience of a public hammam but great to be able to experience as a couple without feeling too intimidated when parading about in paper pants! We opted for the Berber hammam and then the back massage. We both agreed that the hammam was worth it but the massage was a bit of a let down. It's great for a relaxing afternoon after a day walking about the souks. I'd definitely go again, even if a little pricey.

Recommend at the end of a trip. Very relaxing and was perfectly timed at the end of our trip after a day trip to the Atlas mountains. Staff were friendly and I think the services were done to a high standard...we were all very pleased with our packages!

perfect pre dinner for an exiciting day. Hammam de la rose is an elegant and quite place in which relax for a while after a day in Marrakech. Kind people welcome you and make you forget every pain... Worth the visit!

A perfect way to spend an afternoon in Marrakech. My boyfriend and I visited Hammam de la Rose on the second afternoon of our visit to Marrakech. It was a beautiful hammam and totally relaxing. We had the 250dirham hammam which included the traditional process of a black soap scrub and cleanse and relaxing time with mint tea and biscuits, which was perfect. The only thing to note is that our taxi driver took a while to find the Hammam and had to ask the locals and even took us to Riad de la Rose before finding the right place. We had planned to walk back into the square for a wander after our hammam experience, but we both felt so chilled and relaxed that we took a taxi back to our riad and continued to chill out and embrace the relaxation. Both our skin and hair looked amazing! A great hammam for a great price!

A Must-Do Marrakech Experience!. Wonderful oasis nestled in the hustle and bustle of Marrakech. The Hammam is beautiful, clean and completely relaxing. My friend and I left feeling revived and refreshed - and our hair still had the glorious scent of caramel! Would definitely go back next time in Marrakech!

Amazing experience. While in Marrakech, I went to Hammam de la Rose with my boyfriend to relax and enjoy a hammam experience. It was fantastic! I would definitively recommend it 100% to anyone. Very clean, luxurious and great service.
Excellent spa, would recommend. We had a couples massage, very luxurious, very well equipped, great service. Would definitely recommend to anyone.

Top class. This was with out a doubt the highlight of the holiday. Pribably slightly pricier than other Hammams but we had two hours of pure bliss for 700 dhr (round £50). The spa is clean and beautuful...you are not rushed and you come out really refreshed and relaxed. Booking recommended.

The Best Hammam I Have Ever Had.. & I Have Had A Few!,. Our third trip to the Red City and we had spent 3 days trekking the sites and travelling to Essouara and back on a bus. As much as I am in Love with Marrakech, it had given me a hard couple of days. We spotted the De La Rose on our way back from our taxi drop off point and my husband suggested I see about a treatment. I requested a treatment, full Hammam and Massage expecting to be told they were full and they fit me in within the hour. It was delightful. The staff were warm and friendly and the prices were more than reasonable given what some places will try to charge you. My hair has never felt so soft and shone so bright. Neither has my skin. I have enjoyed a number of Hammams on my travels to Morocco, but in all honesty this was by far the best.We purchased some treatment oil on our way out and were shocked at how reasonable that was also. Thank you ladies, I said I would review! I am sorry it has taken since September to do so!

The Best Hour Of My Whole Holiday. I had the Berber treatment and it was fantastic. Do not be put off by its surroundings, it is a five star hammam and would not be out of place in Mayfair and the treatments are all reasonably priced. I would recommend anyone who holidays in Marrakech takes time out here.

Scrubbed up well. Like a lot of places in the Medina what lies behind the facade often surprises. The ambience and decor was very relaxing as was the soft mood music and the rich smells. I have had Hammam's in a few countries over the last 40 years and this was the first time I was attended to by a woman and it was definitely more subtle and even more enjoyable. Probably the best Hammam I have had.

Excellent service. We arrived twenty minutes late but nevertheless they accommodate us, rearranging our schedule around our delay. We spent a few beautiful hours getting pampered to our hearts content. Definitely to be recommended.

A unique experience. I visited this fantastic spot last June, tugged in the heart of Marrakesh historic Medina.I was taken by its exquisite beauty and elegant architecture, as well as the warm welcoming and professionalism of their staff. The place is impeccably clean and the whole atmosphere, light, sounds and smells, made it a unique experience. I will recommend it to everybody who is looking for a proper relaxation. Marcelo

Fabulous experience. I decided to try a spa on my final day in Marrakech.This Hammam was very well recommended for friends.I was surprised and a bit embarrassed when i saw the underwear they provided me, and immediately i asked to have a massage from a man. My concern was not to look naked in front of a religious woman.Well, they did not have a man available, however, i was amazed and my tension disappeared after the woman, very professionally, started touching me.The Hammam was very well decorated and my only regret was to leave it for the final day.

A magic place. This magic place is an expirience to recoverd afert a intensive day of sightseeing.None must miss it. We´v never thought we could find such an Oasis inside the walls of the old town. An old tradicion and a mordern goodtasted style put together. The guys there were so friedly, and evrything very clean.

Wonderful experience. I visited the Hammam de la Rose at the recommendation of my Riad. It was my first trip to a Hammam and my experience was fantastic. I did a 30 minute hammam with a 30 minute massage and it was purely blissful. The facility is clean, smells amazing, is very organized, and I had a wonderful time. The girls were so welcoming and I was completely at ease. The price was very reasonable and I would absolutely visit again.
Beautiful, stylish hamman. A wonderful experience, this is a very stylish hammam, very professional with top of the range products. You will not be disappointed!
over priced and quickest hamman. for a 45 minute session my hair was not washed properly and i was scrubbed for about 5-10 minutes and the rest I spent in the sauna

Everything you expect and more....... This was the second time we visited the Hammam De La Rose after discovering them last year by chance. So our first stop after our arrival in Marrakech was at our favorite hammam !!!! The welcoming atmosphere puts you immediatly in the mood for the relaxing experience you know that is going to follow. We chose the couple package and honoustly, we just didn't want it to stop. The staff is highly skilled, the decor is modern and soothing. The price is reasonable and we highly recommend it to everybody that realy enjoys the full hammam experience!!!!
Great Hamman. Very Clean , Friendly attention , Reasonable prices, great service, well managed and highly recommended

And relax!. Wow this was such a treat, not the cheapest spa but we enjoyed very minute of it. We booked a couples hammam and massage, we're there for so long and came out very relaxed and chilled out. Amazing massage that just went on and on and on .........
visit. very classy and simple .relaxing. no pressure to buy any product . very clean and professional. very reasonebly priced for the service.
great. relaxing and clean and would highly recommend this slightly pricey but worthwhile experience. Well worth a try

Fantastic spa hamman experience. This is a new traditional style building with a modern beautiful spa inside. It has numerous modern stylish moorish references. The staff are welcoming and efficient allowing you to fully enjoy the experience. Myself and my wife had a joint hamman and massage experience and we could nor recommend it highly enough. It was a highlight of our stay and good value too!!

A wonderful experience. This was a truly wonderful expierence that was professional, relaxing and utterly enjoyable.We opted for the couples hamam and massage, and enjoyed a wonderful afternoon (it took about 3 hours, including a cup a delicious tea). The spa was beautifully clean and the staff were professional and welcoming, guiding us through the various treatments and explaining what each of the oils were and what they were for. I would thoroughly recommend!

Amazing experience. This was an amazing experience that left you feeling totally relaxed and refreshed. It is a lovely calm place and clean and professional too. We were taken into our own area, washed down - lighting and environment was lovely too. Covered in oils and then taken to massage area after which showered down and taken upstairs to rest area. I have never had a massage like this before and would highly recommend it.

fab hammam. we had just walked by the spa and decided to book in for a hammam. we were politely greeted and everyone was extremely professional. the hammam was so nice. though, being so hot outside, it wasn't all that fun to sit in a hot steam room, but it was relaxing afterwards.i had booked the appointment with my husband and wasn't expecting it to be a "couples" hammam and massage. at the end of it, my husband commented that he wasn't sure if he felt relaxed or humiliated. our childish laughs and seeing other people wash us was a hoot.we had a good time!

Relaxation. Went here as a couple after a recommendation from our riad. We opted for the whole treatment and were able to start without an appointment, which worked well. The hamman traditional Moroccan scrub fits well with a more Western massage to make a well complemented spa experience! The exfoliation scrub is a unique Moroccan experience! Overall excellent facilities: private lockers, relaxation areas, water, tea, steam rooms, showers, etc. The spa provides underwear, slippers, and robes too. We left feeling super refreshed and relaxed, on a day with 45c / 110f heat!

Couple Paradise. I'll start this review by explaining that we are seasoned Turkish hamman users so had no worries about the " letting it all hang out" element of the activity and have also been married for 25 plus years so no chance of embarrassment. Clothes for the activity involve towelling robes and paper pants for both of you with the robes being discarded pretty quickly! We chose the couple option but could have chosen separate treatments if we wished. The entire experience was luxurious with a great choice of oils and scents and at no time did we feel rushed. It is expensive given the location - I think we worked out it would take an average local about 1.5 months wages to pay for it but for their overseas clientele it's probably normal! Go relax and enjoy!

Wonderful Massage. The facilities were clean and very relaxing. The hammam and gommage was not really a proper hammam and gommage in that I wasn't scrubbed until I squeaked (if you want that, try Heritage spa), but it was very relaxing and I loved that it was done in a very dark room, which made it all feel like it was happening while I was half asleep. The massage was probably the best massage that I have had. The only thing that let down the experience was a very moody member of staff (she performed the hammam on my partner and served us on reception). Overall, clean, great massages, easy to find but service variable and gommage could have been more thorough.

Simply Perfection!. This place has amazing luxury just inside from the dusty, dirty streets of the Medina. It's designed in all glossy blue walls, and a real treat tat will make your trip! Don't miss this one!

Excellent service and value. My husband and i splurged and both had a 4 hand massage. it was amazing. they try every hard to make it enjoyable. they have clean and serene lounges and you get to choose your massage oil. the masseuses worked together and the massage was done in unison. it was amazing. everything was also extremely clean. after our massages, we were given water, tea and juice. if i had to criticize anything it would have to be that the massage beds were not the best i've ever been on. The massage was excellent though and we only paid about $70 for the 4 hands! that is the best spa deal i have ever had!

Satisfactory overall. I walked in without an appointment for a foot massage. The reception girl was rather distant but professional and I was accommodated after just a few minutes' wait. I personally didn't care for the bright (and I mean BRIGHT) apple green, modern decor and will try a spa with a more traditional atmosphere next time. Approx half the foot massage consisted of my feet being placed in one of those foot basins with an electric "massage" function that doesn't deserve the name. After a good 10 minutes of this, the girl finally came in and performed a satisfactory massage. This was certainly pleasant enough, but she didn't seem to have any special expertise. She just massaged my feet as any layperson might. I guess I was expecting a more muted and relaxing atmosphere. It was adequate and a reasonably good value for money, but I wouldn't go back again.
Heaven!. Wonderful couple of hours! Really relaxing! Girls were lovely, very proffesional, peaceful beautiful place. Really good massage. Would strongly recommend a visit.

Relaxing massage, a drink would have been nice though.... My friend and I picked this spa from reviews here on tripadvisor. As we had booked in for a hamman elsewhere (and you're not supposed to have more than one a week) we just booked this one for an hours full body massage. The spa itself was very clean, with a sparkly, modern look to it. We were given clean robes and clean slippers to wear and taken to a nice comfy seated waiting area upstairs. At this point it would have been nice to have been offered a drink (even water as we'd walked for a good 45mins to get there) but we were just left to wait, albeit in very nice surroundings.The massage itself was very good, unfortunately next door they were having building work and were constantly hammering! Credit to my massage lady, at some points I didn't notice it!Overall, although the treatment itself (500dh for an hour) was very good, we didn't receive the same level of customer service as we did at other places and spas we visited in Marrakech.

Very beautiful place but the girls were a bit childish. The location is amazing and the treatment was great but the only thing I disliked is whilst having a massage (with my friend) the two girls were whispering to each other and giggling the entire way through which I found off putting and didn't relaz as much as I should have. I would rather they just talked normally then whisper and do hand signals (which I could feel as one hand suddenly left my back whilst talking and the other one just do something repretitive) this happened numerous times and I felt like we weren't the priority...we did have a great time and it was relazing but that did spoil it slightly.

Really nice spa in the Marrakech Medina. This place is right in the medina near the Dar el Bacha. Easy to get to. It is lovely. We were greated warmly and taken to the locker room (the mens is a bit small, but serves its purpose). The spa is immaculate and nicely designed and comfortable (a rarity in Marrakech). While waiting for your service you are seated in a nice lounge and ofered tea and water. The treatment rooms are spotless, have very pleasant music and are nicely lit. The massage I had was very good, I was offered 4 different scented oils. Prices are standard for Morocco. Would highly recommend. One small thing, when the massage was over, the therapist just left the room quitely...wasn't sure it was all over.
relax!. The perfec t place to relax after a a day in the incredible medina of Marrakech
Outstanding 2 hour luxury. This was the ultimate. The premise was gorgeous and peaceful. The treatments spoke of beauty. A feast for the soul. Relaxing.
Cleansing and invigorating. It was my first visit to a Hammam and I hope it will not be the last. They were very professional and excellent at their tasks.
Hammam & Massage. Loved it, although expensive (700 dir each), our riad booked us into this one as it was nearby, we might have preferred something a bit more traditional.

Enjoy the calm and serenity of the Hammam de la Rose. We just walked in from the street - after a chilly(!) day in the Medina, and got a scrub and a massage which made us feel like heaven on earth. A wonderful way to relax!
Very relaxing. Very relaxing spa , althoiugh the hammam was not hot enough , we finally got to it and had a nice skin rubbing treatment that resembled massage but alittle more rough

Best place for total relaxation. The spa is located in the middle of the city. Just go there and request for appointment. If they do not have immediatelly, go and make some shopping before relaxation. After a few day of tireing travel - you will deserve it! The whole place is very oriental, excellent decoration, nice smell in every room and everythig is totally clean! Massage is also excellent, staff is very friendly and they all speak different languages. So: go and try!!!
Great time here. we had a wonerdful hammam , it is a sort of a steam room where you have a professional masseuse rub your skin to perfection , heaven on earth!!!

A welcome newcomer in the medina. I am so glad that the Hammam de la Rose is in the top 10 place to see in Marrakech I remember writing about it when it was only open for a week and my review was never published as it was so new . Being a regular visitor to marrakech this place is more than welcome. People indulge on a hammam while visiting . One option is to have a hammam in your hotel/riad , but it is not the most practical solution when you are not staying in that hotel or riad. Lots of other option are out of town and require a lot of time to go there. , and some other places are simply tourist trap . This place is wonderfully located, in the northern part of the medina in the dar el bacha area north of the mouassine shopping quarter . The decor is fanstastic , in the turquoise blue and lime green , so you just already feel energised when you entered. The traetment rooms are well done, the staff is very friendly . The reason I don not give it top marls is for the fact that I only , so far , had the time to do quick visit ; waxing , or head massage, but haven't yet experience the hamman , but I have no doubt that it would be living to my expectation. The other thing is I find the staff extremely friendly , but not the one at the reception , and the prices are a bit too high . But it is the ideal place to book while in Marrakech , and so practical as it is in the medina so you can relax after ( or before ) your shopping.

If you are a family with children you should definitely go to this Hammam. The staff were wonderful, I cannot come up with enough compliments to describe how welcoming they made us feel. As a couple with a 6 month old baby we thought that we would not be able to have the Hammam experience together. However the staff were literally fighting over who was going to look after him, they even let him have his own little experience where he was showered and massaged and refused to take any payment for it.We both enjoyed the experience, in beautiful, clean and relaxing surroundings.It is very expensive, but we felt worth every penny.
Pricey but a great experience that was authentic. Jus great experience that was authentic! Clean place with great smells

A great hammam experience in Marrakech Medina. Our first morrocan hammam this afternoon and did not disappoint, the steam room, body scrub and rose mask was sublime followed by mint tea on the terrace then a relaxing massage. We came home feeling relaxed and half a stone lighter ( all the dead skin we left behind). Wish we had time to do it again!

Wonderful. My husband and I had a couples hammam which was really lovely. The sauna room specifically was an absolute vision being tiled in blue-green opalescent tiles with a beautiful fountain in middle - if it hadn't been so bloody hot I'd have been content to stay there all day. I felt appallingly embarassed at having to strip off down to just the tiny g-string that they provide, but the staff are so professional and relaxed at the same time that even I managed to relax (somewhat...).

Worth every penny. We visited the Hammam De La Rose attracted by very good reviews on trip advisor. And we were not disappointed. The staff is very friendly, you can just relax and be taken care of. We paid around MAD 1300 for a hammam and full body massage for 2 people (2h). It was excellent experience!

Perfect Spa Experience. This place was opposite where we stayed (the beautiful Palais Dar Donab) so was ultra convienient. Indeed, if you DEFINATELY want to go to this spa during your stay, it would be a good idea to stay at Dar Donab for this reason alone (I can imagine navigating back to a random Riad down the busy streets would otherwise obliterate any real sense of zen...).Anyway, the hammam session for my partner and I was wonderful and I would thoroughly recommend it. Afterwards we relaxed with a pot of tea, dates and glowing skin in their funky relaxation area-a must do if you like spa treats snd relaxation!

Excellent.. Hammam De La Rose was excellent. Having never experienced a Hammam before I was slightly apprehensive but need not have been. The staff are so polite and professional, the place is beautiful, lux, clean and atmospheric. I left feeling truly relaxed and cleaner than ever before! I cannot recommend highly enough.

Awesome. Went here on Valentines day with my girlfriend as a treat on our last day in Marrakech and my it didnt disappoint!! The place is squeaky clean and all the staff professionalism is second to none. We went for the full scrub + massage which you really have to go for! Cost wise, its on top end prices but worth every penny. My girlfriend loved it so much she went back there yesterday as we had a few hours to kill on way to the airport for a manicure!'' An hours manicure for 250 dirham, 'where would you get that in London?!', - is all i could hear her saying all day! Thank you again Naima and Fatima for a fabulous experience and the manageress (sorry cant remember your name) for organising!

Amazing. Went with 7 friends and all walked out amazed with the hammam and massage we received. Amazing people and very professional and friendly. price is very cheap for the great service you receive. guys working there are not afraid to go that extra mile all credit to the manageress Bauchra. 1 of my friend had back problem but this did not stop them from putting his slippers on and making him feel really comfortable. easy reach and always make availability. Can not speak highly about this place. would defiantly recommend getting the full service for 700dr, will feel refreshed head to toe. Excellent, Excellent, Excellent
Great Experiance. All round good couple of hours not cheap about a £100 two people two hours.But very profesional.

Convenient location & easy to get a reservation. I had planned on going to Les Bains de Marrakech, but the Haman de la Rose was just a 2 min walk from the Riad Zalia where we were staying, so I dropped in to make a reservation. They had a spot available for the next day. I had the traditional black soap scrub (my first time) followed by a massage. The whole experience was relaxing and the staff was very professional. The price was a real bargain.... $75 for everything.
Looked didn't try. Looked amazing! Very clean and high end. Wish I'd had time to experience. Def worth a look!

Relaxing!. We decided to go there because many people gave good comments on Trip Advisor.It is located near Dar El Bacha. You can find it easily.It takes 3 minutes walk from Dar Charkia where we stayed.We visited there on Dec.30.We took full course for couple (700DH a person ).All room was very clean and stylish.Front ladies spoke good English.However the ladies in Hammam didn’t understand English but French.At first we dressed off at the dressing room.They prepared everything to be needed in each locker.You don’t have to bring towel nor bikini. After undressed we went to Hammam.Hammam was very clean.But temperature was lower than we expected.And we wanted to stay longer in Hammam.We moved to beds for scrubbing from Hammam in a short time.After scrubbing we moved to waiting room where we had a cup of tea.reading books. We stayed for long time at waiting room without any informationafter scrubbing.I felt a little bit cold during waiting for massage because our body wereall of wet.We hope they will give us some information what comes next after body scrubbingand place a heater in the waiting room Massage ladies were well trained.Their massages were excellent.We could choose our favorite one of 4 kinds of massage oil.We were satisfied with good relax time thanks to massage ladies.It is recommendable to make reservation since it looked very popular and some people tried to book in same day appointment were declined.Enjoy!

Finally ..... Relax. After 10 days tour, we needed some relax. This hammam was not far away from our riad. The staff were so nice. When we entered a smiling lady came to us to explain us in English the idea of hammam. We did the packet: hammam+peeling+massage. The cost is 700dhs each, but is worth. The place is clean and the oils using for the massage are very good. I bought some of their oils for my friends in Italy.

Fantastic - truly wonderful experience!. This Hammam is truly exceptional! I am from NYC , in the beauty business, and can truly say that this experience was amazing. The Hammam is cleaner and more professional than any spa I have ever been to. The woman who work here are so polite and gracious . One of the most amazing massages I have ever had. The scrub down was also fabulous. It is truly a fabulous spa/Hammam- take it from a new York girl who has experienced all the best !
Relax to the max. Hammam, massage, manicure, it was all really well done. Great atmosphere, great people. Super.

Wonderfully Relaxing. We'd never tried a hammam before so were slightly apprehensive. We stumbled across De La Rose by chance, it's quite easy to find in the Medina. We hadn't booked and that wasn't a problem though we got the impression that it would be better if you do. This facility is stylish, spacious and the atmosphere throughout is ethereal and relaxing. The staff put you totally at ease and the half hour massage was over far too quickly. We had a private hammam, comfortably hot then were showered and scrubbed. The whole experience was calm, relaxing and elegant. The place is well setup for couples, 2 men in our case, but the hammams are big enough for a family or group. The experience wasn't cheap but well worth it - think how much you've saved by bargaining in the souks! Although our first hammam experience we are keen to try it again - though I doubt that many places will be as good De La Rose.
Beautiful Hamman. The girl that scrubbed me down was a real pro - my skin was so soft when I left - take the service just before you go to bed!
Amazing. Probably the best in the old town. Completely modern (opened 9 months ago).

An amazing way to relax and unwind in a busy and exciting city. This visit was part of my birthday present from my daughter, who had arranged this surprise holiday to Marrakech. The spa was very clean and well organised and the staff were very friendly.We read that some of the hammams or spa's in Marrakech were a bit like a production line, there was no sense of that here. It was a marvellous way to relax and recharge our batteries after a few days in Marrakech and was just what was needed. It was one of the loveliest spa experiences I have ever had.

Amazing 5* Hammam. What a find... :-) Relaxing, very clean and modern Hammam with very friendly and professional staff.Very relaxing massage. Definitely one of the best Hammam's in Marrakech, at a much better value than in 5* hotels.Inside Medina, but easy to find and also easy to get there by taxi.

Excellent and relaxing. Very nicely laid out and designed spa, amazing lighting and very clean. We went for the full 700DH 2 hour steam/scrub/massage which was excellent! Much better value than would be the case in the UK - and a much better experience I'd imagine.

An afternoon of Bliss..... Highly recommend this spa. Very clean and staff was friendly Wonderful treatments with lovely products. You will literally "float" out when you are finished with your treatments.

fantastic hammam. I'm a Marrakech's habitue and in this way I like to see new places. One of this is Hammam de La Rose. It's in Dar El Bacha district. The place is very clean and the girls working there are very professional. The atmosphere is relaxing and you don't want to get out from here. The scent, the music .... everything is done for your well being.

Very clean, refined Hammam.. excellent place to experience luxury & tradition. I loved this place.. the personel was very attentive and the products used smelled beautifully. I felt I came out brand new. I did the shortest Hammam (30m) it was well worth it!

A real treat (couples can go together) clean, modern and affordable. This spa is worth it! Clean and modern, hammam treatment 30 minutes is 200 Dirham. You can also go for a 2 hours hammam/massage combination (700 Dirham) , but for that you have to reserve in advance.The personnel are all women. And as a couple you can join the hammam together. We've talked with a local and he says this is the best hammamspa in Marrakech.
V Relaxing. High quality treatments & very relaxing and unrushed.Not cheap, but worth it.

total relaxation. My boyfriend and I originally chose this hammam as they were able to cater for couples wanting to 'hammam together'! The building and rooms were spotless with a clever use of lighting... the staff were very professional and although we were slightly out of our comfort zone (both of us standing in our paper g-stringy things!) We both really enjoyed the experience and felt totally relaxed. Blokes please note that you should let your wife/girlfriend go first so that you can watch her being showered down!

Utter bliss!. We visited this hammam as it is just a five minute walk from Dar Charkia where we were staying. The place is spotlessly clean and the girls delightful, all dressed alike in green and white. Robes, slippers and G strings are provided on arrival and then you are led into the steam room which is subtly lit with a fountain playing in the centre. Rose petals are scattered on the towels. After 10 minutes relaxing there you are led into the next room and soaped all over with eucalyptus soap before being thoroghly exfoliated - this part can be a liittle daunting as the mitts are quite rough but if you can stand it your skin feels like a new-born baby's afterwards. If you wish for gentler treatment just ask. Then a warm shower before being rubbed with rose scented oil. Robes back on and you are led into a large room full of white sofas to enjoy a cool drink. Throughout soft and relaxing music is playing. It's hard to get up and get dressed to leave - you feel like staying there all day. We had the basic hammam for DH 300 but for a little more you could have an all over massage as well. We will definitely be going back there at least once on our next visit.

Amazing. I did not actually use the facilities at this hammam. However if you are wondering why I am writing a review, it is because I was shown around it and experienced other hammams that I could compare against. This hammam is not that difficult to find but well worth looking for. It is a luxury complex with the highest standards and cleanliness I have ever seen. This is of a better standard than most exclusive versions of spa/beauty treatment centres in London uk. The rooms are so tranquil and well designed! The staff are very professional and speak good English. Other hammams throughout Marrakech are dingy, dirty and feel like your being rushed through on a conveyor belt their staff can be staff and some are a bit too inappropriate. In this hammam you are treated with excellent customer sevice.It is a little but more expensive, but well worth it for the standard and cheaper than anything like that you would find in the uk.

Stylish venue, let down by average to bad spa experience. We had booked about 2 mths ago and asked to prepay before our booking would be accepted. That was ok although unexpected, until we arrived for our appointment to find they had no record of it. Not the best start you'd expect from an establishment claiming to be as special as they do, and made us feel very awkward right from the beginning. We'd booked the Hammam and oil massage afterwards. Despite arriving early as asked in their email, we were not provided with the pre-spa experience as promised, but offered robes and asked to change. Now, we've had hammams before in Turkey, and this was a sort of hammam but a very weak one, not a real one. Two ladies went through the process of throwing water on us and very feebly soaping up our skin before being left in the sweat room for way beyond the promised ten minutes with no water. Carelessly the tap was annoyingly left dripping making a loud noise that completely ruined any chance of relaxing. Needless to say we got concerned we'd been forgotten about after the ten minutes had lapsed and had to start taking water from the washing tap to ward off dehydration.Finally the therapists arrived back and we got to ask for some bottled water. They then directed us to another room where a severe exfoliation took place as well as shampooing of the body and hair. The consultants then left the room again for 5 mins but as neither of us had been rinsed off properly we had to quickly re rinse ourselves as we both got bad soap stinging in our eyes. This was not going well, and again no chance to relax and enjoy this not inexpensive experience.As per other Hammans, after 5 minutes we were then rinsed again and left to cool and try to relax in bathrobes, but that was impossiblein a very noisey spa area. Another guest felt the noise of staff chattering at reception and the banging of doors so bad she shut the spa doors, as they should have been, to get some peace and quiet. But the staff opened them again - again no chance to relax! We then progressed to our massage treatment.Luckily for me I had a massage therapist who was experienced and knew what she was doing. Unfortunately my partner had the opposite experience and wanted to stop the treatment as it was a waste of time despite the massage therapist being asked three times to increase the pressure. This experience left them frustrated and really annoyed a lot of money had been wasted.We shared our experiences with the shift manager at the time of our departure and as some compensation, besides an apology and promise of a complimentary treatment next time if we are ever back in Marrakech, we were given two free beers at the rooftop bar.I don't think we'll be taking up the free service offer. Nice rooftop bar though.

Sensational hammam!. What a beautiful place. Its truly exquisite. We were a group of 10 and went for the hammam at this beautiful spa. We all left feeling like new people. Some of the party had massages which they thoroughly enjoyed. Definitely try the hammam!!

A simply wonderful hamman and massage. We went here based on the reviews and we weren't let down. Despite it being tucked away in streets we didn't know, it was actually quite easy to find the hotel. The welcome was excellent and we were shown to the spa, where the welcome was again, friendly and efficient. We had a couples spa experience with a traditional steam room (by god that was warm and humid) followed by a scrubbing and a wash from the friendly staff. We then had a 4 hands massage, which was a new experience. We both found that we each had one masseuse that was slightly firmer than the other, which was about the only criticism. And that's so minor it's hardly worth mentioning as the massage itself was firm but relaxing. Neither of us had any muscle pain the following day. We did both fall asleep at the end as well. Definitely one of the best spa experiences I've had.

You cannot leave Marrakesh without stopping by, seriously!. We got the couples package and couldn't have chosen a better spa for it. We now have La Sultana Spa in our top 5 must-do things in Marrakesh! Unlike a couple of other spas we used, here we found no old/stained towels, moldy smells, disappointing massages or gaps of information by the staff. I very much appreciated that the sponges and other tools they use on you are new out of the package, which they open in front of you, and they even give it to you at the end. The facilities are beautiful (the jacuzzi in particular may be the most beautiful we've seen), the staff very courteous and attentive, and the treatments well executed. I got "French" nails, which I only later learned had an extra cost, but they took it off the bill without me even raising the issue. We also appreciated that there was no rush to get us through, which we noticed in a couple of other places, so we were able to really enjoy the experience.We wrapped up the session with lunch by the pool and highly recommend doing this. You should definitely save some room for dessert, as their desserts are not only good but also little pieces of art. The gentleman from the front desk offered us cold water bottles on our way out... this was very welcome before heading back to Marrakesh crazy streets and high August temperatures.Overall, the experience was worth every penny and we can't wait to do it again whenever we are back.

Spa bliss in the Marrakech heat. My husband and I stayed at La Sultana Marrakech and received a massage and hammam as part of our honeymoon package. We were over the moon with the spa, the photos do not do it justice in the slightest and out of the many hammams we had in Morocco, this was heads and shoulders above the others. The staff were friendly, attentive, thorough and respectful, in particular taking time to discuss the most appropriate oils (I have a nut allergy) and being physically delicate after a recent illness. We shall absolutely be returning to the spa when we are next in Marrakech. Very impressed with this hidden treasure.

Absolute Pleasure . My husband and I indulged in the 'Couples Absolute Pleasure' package and weren't disappointed! The hammam was amazing and we loved the beautiful setting. The marble jacuzzi is stunning - so romantic. The staff were extremely helpful - even re-touching my nails for me after I dented a couple following my mani! Highly recommend.

Amazing place and wonderful staff . Amazing place , with amazing and welcoming stuffSpecial thanks to Bouchra,Soukaina,Aziza & Zakia for their amazing massage and Hamam .Really we had a great time and we do taste the Moroccan amazing culture spa

hidden gem inside the buzzy city. It is my 5th time in Marrakesh, and I always come back to Sultana spa. It is a hidden gem inside the buzzy city. Located in a fairy-tale style hotel, this spa enchants you. You always wish to return.Sultana spa manager, charming Rashida, runs a team of massage, facial and hammam therapists, each best in her own field. A combination of bubbly jacuzzi, hot mint tea, thorough hammam treatment, gentle facial and deep tissue massage is an amazing value for money. You will be treated with fig oils, mud wraps, grapefruit creams and rose water. Sultana makes you forget about life outside the walls of this fort, unfinished to-do lists or anything else. Instead, you will focus on yourself, reconnect with your body and get a much deserved break. Time to feel pampered and spoilt! Great thanks to Rashida and her dedicated team, and I cannot wait to be back next year.

Just go!. When we made an appt here we had no idea how luxurious it was going to be. We thought we had wanted something nice, but a little more "traditional/low end" so when we arrived at this lovely hotel we were a bit taken aback. But all that passed in a moment! There are many levels and styles of "hamams" as we learned during our 3 different visits over two weeks in Morocco, and though "rustic and traditional" is a certain kind of experience you might want to have, if you really want to be pampered, indulged in, experience something different than you can find at home, be in a place of total beauty and serenity, feel like a new person after you leave this sanctuary, you must go to Sultana Spa. I will hold this in my mind's eye for a very long time.

A true oasis!. Spent last Saturday there for the Hamam, a massage and more. It was the most serene pampering experience I've ever enjoyed. An oasis in the bustling city of Marrekech! My husband joined me later for a foot massage, and he loved it too! Rachida was delightful, kind and most helpful. The entire staff who treated us were beyond professional, polite and gentle. Many thanks to Zakia for my introduction to Hamam, and to Niema, Karina, Dounia and Bouchra for all of their services. The entire team created a serene pampering experience we will never forget!

Relaxing and beautiful . We found this place from trip advisor so we have a high expectations for the service. Me and my boyfriend did hammam and massage together, and I also did a facial care. The experience of hammam was really good and comfortable, also the massage made us really relax after days of walking. I did facial care so called "silky honey face", they will put a kind of honey mask on your face twice as well as clean your face, but this mask might not be right for me , my face is sensitive and after it doesn't feel good . But overall , we had a really nice afternoon here, the spa room and hotel garden is so beautiful!

serene heaven in the center of bustling Marrakech. My partner, myself and my mother in law visited this spa after a long stroll through the small streets and souks of Marrakech. We were welcomed by Rachidad and her friendly team members. They took the time to explain us the different treatments and answer all our questions. The spa is part of the Sultana hotel which is one of the top end luxury hotels in Marrakech. The hammam treatment started with roughly 15 minutes in the steam room, followed by a scrub/ wash session in the hammam. As a bonus my mother in law was offered a free massage which she really enjoyed, as she suffered from severe pain in her neck. The massage offered by Rachidad made her pain disappear almost completely. I have not visited any other spas in Marrakech, so I cannot compare this place with any other similar spa. But compared to spa experiences in other places our treatment at Sultana was a wonderful relaxing experience. I would definitely recommend anyone who spends time in Marrakech to visit this spa.
Spa heaven!! . Unbelievable service and amazing experience!! Best spa experience in Marrakesh! Hands down a great Hamam experience and highly recommend the candle wax massage!

Very professional and beautifully decorated . From the reception to the exit you are treated with care. We went in as a couple and did the hammam, scrub and clay covering for 1100 mad. They don't rush you and the surrounding is great.

Spa heaven. Rachidad and her team make, what is without doubt a most beautiful spa, into the perfect spa. Small, stunning, stylist. Kind, welcoming and outstanding treatments. My friend and I spent a blissful afternoon in the wonderful subterranean world of this perfect place. Having experienced many spas around the world, this was by far the best, both personal and professional and exclusive. Heaven in a heavenly hotel in the middle of bustling Marrakech.

Most relaxing spa experience ever . Me and my wife, we were welcomed by the professional staff. This place is worth to visit... No hurry, no mass production timelines etc. Everything is planned individually for you. Highly recommended!

Here you will be a princess!. I never had a hammam or any professional wellness treatments like these before - and Sultana Spa made this the most beautiful experience I had so far. The Beldi Signature treatment was a dream! Although the hammam is a very intimate bath, these lovely ladies make you feel very loved. Never had anyone washed my body and hair with so much care, I adored it. The following massage was just amazing. These ladies knew what they were doing! And finally, we got a facial care treatment combined with a soft head massage while the mask was one my face doing its job. Between the "steps" we got a tasty juice and some minutes to relax. If you ever have the chance to visit this place and spa - do it!

Excellent hammam experience. We loved our visit to Sultana Spa. The staff was extremely professional and made us feel very comfortable throughout our visit. It is well-priced for such a luxurious experience. They make it incredibly relaxing and do not rush you out at the end of your appointment. We stuck around in our robes for a good twenty minutes after our treatments wrapped up. We'd highly recommend this hammam!

Relaxing treatments in a beautiful spa. I had booked for my husband and I to have a couples hammam followed by relaxing massages after. I had booked in for the candle massage and my husband for the four hands massage. From the moment we arrived we were made to feel welcome and we changed and went in to the relaxation area where there was a beautiful big jacuzzi. After relaxing for 20 minutes or so we were led in for our hammam treatment. The hammam was fantastic I felt like my skin was glowing afterwards and would definitely recommend to anyone. The message after was also lovely and very relaxing and my husband very much enjoyed his too. This is a beautiful spa that is very relaxing and smells divine I can't recommend it enough!!

This will be your best hammam experience ever. Lovely environment, clean, great service, super relaxing. Can't beat it. Aziza in the hammam was super professional and Atika and Niena are amazing masseurs. Good luck finding another hammam with a luxury whirlpool in the waiting room!

Beautiful In Many Ways. I had four massages from three places while on vacation. This was the best. The staff was amazing and was very accommodating on pressure and focus. My preference is to relax after a massage and their relaxing room is picturesque. The customer photos are spot on. The long narrow pool is a deep Jacuzzi (4 feet). It is along enough to swim, but you just sit under water and feel the jets. Great massage, beautiful facility and very cheap by USA standards. The place to go.

Totally relaxing. Entering La Sultana the hussle and bussle of Marrakech traffic totally disappeared. One of my treats on this birthday break was a candle massage. Shown to my massage room in brillant white robes and slippers by a charming young lady. The massage was conducted in a candle lit room, the warm oil flowing over my back and legs. After 20 minutes I was quietly asked to turn over, I didn't hear her. I had dropped off to sleep. That massage was one of the best I have ever had. Afterwards relaxing by the pool with a soothing cup of mint tea. Exquisite

Thanks you. Great memories are back. 9 years after our wedding trip and stay at la sultana the pleasure is here again. Enjoyable moment with friends. Great hamam and scrub and fantastic candel massage. Thank you very much

Couples Hamman. Fab and relaxing Hamman for couples. Scrubbed down in two separate areas after relaxing in the beautiful spa, given a choice of massage. My partner was in seventh heaving with the four hands massage and I enjoyed the candle treatement. Cost came in at around £125 per person but we were there for over two hours and came out feeling fully relaxed and skin feeling wonderful. Followed by lunch on the roof top terrace which was superb.
Fantastic place and amazing hammam and four hand massage. We have enjoyed a great hammam experience with a four hand massage in the most beautiful spa we have ever been in. Thanks for the great time.

Complete Luxury. The Spa at La Sultana is beautifully designer and provides a cozy, intimate atmosphere for all your beauty needs. While they have a wonderful amount of one-off treatments, I'd recommend putting together a relaxing package and spending some considerable time there! I had the Beldi Signature Experience (Hammam, Full Body Massage, and Facial) and a Blowdry! It was even arranged that I would be picked up straight from the Airport and brought to the Spa - a very relaxing way to start a long weekend in Marrakech!

Great experience. Went without planning it ahead and the spa managed to accommodate me and my girlfriend right away. Really friendly reception from rachida and amazing couples treatment from Imane and Bouchra. Highly recommended spa

Absolutely Fabulous - A must do!. WOW what an experience, absolute bliss! This place is a must! One of the best massages I have ever had. The spa is stunning, a wonderful way to start a great holiday. We finished with lunch on the roof top terrace which was also amazing. We cant wait to return! 10*

Day of Pampering. We decided to treat ourselves to the Couples Package at the Spa. We had a traditional Hammam, manicure, pedicure and full body massage plus use of the Jacuzzi pool. The most relaxing and luxurious experience I think I've ever had and I would recommend it to anyone.

Completely blissed out..... I sampled a hammam, mani / pedi and daily massages during my 6 night stay at La Sultana. Firstly, the spa itself is stunning - I defy anyone not to utter "wow!" When seen for the first time; the main relaxation area is centered around a large pink marble spa pool with comfortable loungers. Hammam treatment rooms open off this central area. this was my first hammam and I would absolutely recommend the treatment, the difference in my skin was incredible. My mani / pedi was carried out by 2 beauticians working in parallel and was excellent too. I have to say though, the standout treatment for me has been the massages given by Atika; I have recently been quite ill and the difference even the first massage made to me was noticeable, so much so that my husband insisted I booked daily for the rest of our stay. I cannot thank Atika enough - she has made me feel like myself again and for that I am very grateful! So, thank you ladies of la sultana spa, you have put me back together and given me an addiction to Argan oil that will last a lifetime :-)

Very pleasant. This spa was a very pleasant discovery during our stay in Marrakech.
They offer diverse services in a very relaxing and tranditional atmosphere.
The staff is also very friendly (ask for Ilham and Rachida for massages).
Until next time....

Hammam on another level. This is the most relaxing and beautiful hammam I have ever seen. I recommend this to everyone who is in Marrakech. A great tip is to get there a half an hour earlier to relax in the pool with a cup of mint tea. The atmosphere is so relaxing that after a few minutes you will forget where you are and get sucked in its greatness.

Spa at La Sultana. I booked the Beldi experience package for me and my boyfriend and it was amazing. The package includes the Hammam ritual, a body massage and a facial treatment. My skin was soooo soft after the treatment! It was a good experience.I recommend this Spa.

A relaxing afetrnoon!. The SPA is very beautiful, it has a big jacuzzi where you can nearly swim and everything is in marble. I chose the Aventure Beldi and I was completely satisfied. The best part is the massage: a special thank to Ilham. She was very professional and showed a great expertise. We even went back after two days for the 4 hands massage, very nice treatment again. I would totally suggest this place. Finally, thank you to Rachida, the SPA manager, she was ready to satisfy any request we had!

Overpriced and average. The spa is beautiful and relaxing but the gommage treatment was rather cursory and short. After our gommage we waited for our massage but were forgotten about until we asked. Massages were good but overall very expensive for Marrakech. More than double the price of comparable spas.

Amazing lunch. Lovely lunch on the terrace, overlooking Saadian Tumbs, amazing hotel to walk through to reach the restaurant, this place has been renovated to make it look like a 1001 nights palace with all the original features. It could be a museum… Can be a bit expensive lunch but totally worth it and finally not so expensive compared to london!

Fantastic service. All the staff we encountered at this spa were very friendly and helpful. We visited the spa on our last day before heading to the airport, hoping to relax and prepare ourselves for the flight. We booked in for the hammam treatment which was a unique experience and we weren't quite sure what to expect. The girl performing our treatment was really sweet, and made us feel very comfortable and relaxed. We arrived at the spa at 11am and didn't leave until 2.30pm. It seemed that the treatment could progress at whatever speed you wanted and we were under no pressure to leave, which was perfect for us as we headed straight to the airport after completing our treatments. We were also provided with bottled water and mint tea, free of charge. We chose this spa because we wanted to have a gentle introduction to an authentic moroccan experience and we were really pleased with our choice.

spa staff were rubbish even though the spa was beautiful. We didn't stay in the hotel but booked a spa there as we thought it looked lovely from the pictures eve though it was "5 star" and therefore expensive. We were rushed in by spa staff stomping around looking grumpy, not given a towel and left in the jacuzzi which was to cold to stay in for more than 2 minutes. When we were retrieved for our massage we were given a flimsy gown but no towel and not given anything to dry off with so left shivering( all 3 of us independently) The massage was rushed and the masseuse left me at the end in the pitch dark with no indication she was finished. just a slammed door behind her. I had to ask for a shower afterwards to wash off the oil and then again was not given a towel afterwards. We were then rushed out ( of the very splendid looking hotel) Based on this I wouldn't rate the sultana. The hotel was also hard to find.

Total relaxation . An amazing experience, my wife convinced me to go and I am so glad she did. We were washed and scrubbed and then had the most amazing massage. Please make this part of your trip to this amazing place!
Nice massage. Samira at Riad Romance recommended this. We had a nice massage. Clean. Friendly staff. They gave a small bottle of argan oil as a gift.

Words cannot begin to describe.... My husband and I had looked at quite a lot of different places and nearly opted for a cheaper alternative - we are so glad we didn't. Rosa Bonheur were able to fit us in at short notice and we opted for the Ritual signing Rosa Bonheur package. This was our first hammam and we weren't too sure what to expect. The team at Rosa Bonheur were fantastic, they were professional from the minute we walked in. At each step of the package we were told what would happen so we knew what was coming. The hammam was an amazing experience, the two women who treated us were obviously experienced and made sure we were always happy and comfortable. We then both had a medium massage which were the best massages we have ever had. We have had quite a few massages while travelling and Saida and Leila are easily on another skill level. We can't recommend this place enough! Please please please go - you won't be disappointed! We will definitely be returning on our next visit to Marrakech. Thank you so much to everyone involved in our experience there :)

Amazing place . Visited this Hamam massage venue in Morocco, this was amazing throughout the full time we where there, everything was explained and showed step by step, jowad the host that was looking after us was amazing really made us feel welcomed, I have a full list of the staff members they where amazing. Top place

WOW. Little gem in middle of Marrakech madness!Small and cozy hammam, very high quality massage with very friendly and helpful staff!After making booking most likely they will offer to meet you in main square as the location of Hammam is very difficult to find.Definitely would go back, great value for money! Visited July 2015

Fabulous experience. We spent several hours here (private hammam, gommage, massage, facial and lunch - including a vegetarian meal), and absolutely loved it. We were completely relaxed afterwards, and it was one of the highlights of our visit to Marrakech. Best ever massage. We'll definitely come here again, next time we come to Marrakech. It is hard to find (though not impossible, because we managed it) so do contact them first if you'd like someone to guide you there.

Great spa and hammam experience. My husband and I visited and had a great experience. We had the hammam scrub, facial, foot scrub and massage. The staff was amazing an accommodating. The place is tricky to find so I would recommend asking them to come find you. We got lucky and one of their staff saw us lost in the tiny street.The only thing it was lacking was a relaxation room. My friends that went to another one were able to chill by a pool or sauna in between and after their services. That would have been nice. Other than that it was perfect!
Best massage ever. Best massage ever! Staff is super kind en takes plenty of time for you. Totally relaxed after almost three hours in the hamam/spa. Worth every dirham!!

Luxury Hammam Experience . There's so much praise to give to this wonderful Hammam and it's fantastic staff. After doing a desert excursion for a few nights I came back to Marrakesh feeling like I had sand in all the wrong places. I visited the Hammam after reading the sterling reviews here on TripAdvisor and it was so refreshing to see how accurate they were. From the moment I walked in and until the moment I walked out I was treated excellently. I had the pleasure of being greeted and served tea by the charming Jawad, had a splendid time meeting the Hamaam owner Mariam, was scrubbed clean from head to toe by the ever so detailed Hesna and Fatima, and all before I received a rejuvenating massage by Layla. There's so much more raving that I can do but I'll leave it at this. Hammam Rosa Bonheur is the best way to take a break from the Hustle and bustle of the red city, if just for a moment. PS. To the guys, you're in for a treat when you see what you have to wear into the Hammam

Great experience. After reading reviews I decided to try this spa out. I was able to walk in (although it was very difficult to find and I would recommend emailing and setting up a pick up location. They were very quick to respond via email) and book a hammam and massage with no problems. It was my first time doing a hammam and it was absolutely awesome. Very relaxing and the ladies for both services were very lovely. They served tea and biscuits before and after as well. After the argan oil massage I had I was able to shower off as well - very clean and nice facilities. Worth every penny and would recommend to anyone!

Ten out of Ten..... An amazing, and well needed couple of hrs of peace and relaxation in a very noisy, polluted and busy city. A true diamond of Marrakech! I was met at the Bahia Palace after failing to find the place 3 times on my own (google pin not 100% in the right place), the staff are friendly and so incredibly polite, there is such an air of tranquility the whole time. I've had facials and massages before, but this was something else, I really did feel so much better afterwards, I would highly recommend going even if it's for a short session - there are so many options so there's something to fit everyones timescale and budget. I can't recommend them high enough!

Amazing!. Found this spa through trip advisor and emailed them to get more information. They responded instantly and even had a phone conversation where they arranged to pick us up near the Bahia Palace (otherwise we would have been lost), so that was really nice of them. Extremely welcoming staff! The experience was amazing and they didn't make us feel uncomfortable at all and didn't force us into trying their other services. We did the fully body massage and Hammam which I would highly recommend. Very relaxed would definitely go back. It's also in a nice location so afterwards you can walk through the souks.

This is exceptional. I've been to Hammams and massages before but this was just as good as it gets. The atmosphere, the people, the proffessionality, the tea... simply a heavenly experience, would come here again and again. Might be the best hammam in the world.A must experience.

When places are THIS GOOD...... Went expecting it yo be good be ause of the reviews but really was amazefHad a masage hamman and facial and they were all perfect...extraordinary even but the best is all the staff are so nice. Properly nice... i had a totally wonderful afternoon... the best

Amazing massage. Spent the afternoon at this spa and was very well looked after by the staff. We had the special offer treatments a hammam, full body massage, facial and foot treatment plus a 3 course meal for 95 euros. The massage was the best I have ever had and would highly recommend this spa if you are looking for a relaxing, pampering afternoon after the assault of the square and the souks..

Peacefull experience which you will need for sure.. When we came to this place the team gave us a warm welcome with mint tea and biscuits. The hammam and the scrub gave us a super soft and new skin. The staff was super friendly. The place very clean and the massages were heavenly and very professional . Dinner was also very good. We were relaxed from head to toe. At the end we got a complimentary bottle of Argan oil. Special thanks to our hammam ladies Laila and Khadijo and to our masseuses Nezha and Nisrin. We will come back for sure!

Perfect & Exellent . Each of our trip we do a duet spa with my husband. So we test the Royl ritual pack and we were delighted to deliver provided.The welcome is warm and attentive care is very good and very good quality products . To make and remake their eyes closed.

Worth every penny . We had the 2h30 care + meal for a couple which cost 2052 dirhams for both of us. If you can get over wearing a paper thong and nothing else for half a day (for men and women) then the experience is amazing. Best massage we've ever had and the meal on the terrace was a lovely way to finish. A great day!
5 star spa. One of the best massage i've ever had. Very welcoming and caring staff. Excellent food. It highly worths the price.

A Must Do. This is great place to spend half a day or more being tended to and eating their fabulous food. Visiting this spa was the highlight of my trip, and it's worth discovering. Plus, you get your money's worth here, and this place is quite the bargain. The staff is friendly and attentive, and this was what my body needed on this trip.

Superb hammam. A group of 5 of us came here recently and booked a full body massage and facial each. We had a fantastic time.Once you get over the paper thin thong you are required to wear, the massage is incredibly relaxing and enjoyable, as is the facial. The masseuses will do the level of pressure that you want and are attentive and good at what they do. We all left feeling rejuvenated.The prices aren't the cheapeast, but you get your money's worth.NOTE OF WARNING: The place is hard to find. If you book in advance, they will often send someone to meet you at Djemaa el Fna. If not, there will be people near the hammam offering to show you the way. They will then demand money from you once you get there.

Nice Hamman, but a bit too pricy!. The Hamman is a nice, small but clean place! The staff is polite and friendly! The treatments were also relaxing and nice! For Morocco the price is a bit to high (160 € for two), downside was that paying by credit card was not possible, so we were brought to a cash machine to pay the treatment! From the service itself I would recommend the Hamman, a massage you would definitely get cheaper at other places!
Friendly but superficial . It was my first so I have to comparison possible. Everyone was very friendly but they are there to make money I guess. They don't accept cards.

Very personal, relaxing and attentive staff. This was the second hammam we visited and whilst it might not be the most luxurious it was certainly the most personal. The stf were so friendly and attentive, and the treatments were much more thorough than the more expensive hammam we visitied. The massage was incredible and we loved the moroccan meal on the terrace we had! Thoroughly recommend!

Excellent massage. I have just tried the massage at this Hammam and I absolutely loved it. The staff is very accommodating and friendly, the place is clean and I particularly liked that they have a shower that you can use before or after the massage so you can go directly after a long day of sightseeing without any worries. They also have a hairdryer which comes in handy :)

great place for massage. We had a lovely massage in a beautiful place.. They listend very well what kind of things you prefer. They took all the time for it. We had an hour massage but it take one a half hour. Shower room with towels where availleble. We where compleet relax afterwards.

Best Spa Experience of my life!!!!. If you are visiting Marrakech, Hammam Rosa Bonheur is an absolute must do!!!! The women were very friendly and professional and pampered me beyond measure! I chose the 2.30 care plus Moroccan meal package and I could not have been happier with the service I received!! The location is a little difficult to find but well worth the effort. If I come back to Marrakech, I will definitely visit again!!!

Best experience of my life . I had a full body 1 h massage with argan oil. The whole experience was fantastic - ladies offered me some tea with biscuits on arrival and as soon as I decided what type of massage I wanted, they were ready to take me . A masseuse was a wonderful and very attentive lady, she asked me how hard do I want my massage to be . The room was cosy with low lights and air conditioning . But the thing I liked most - was the massage itself . It was THE BEST MASSAGE OF MY LIFE. Although it says 'body', the lady also massaged my head and face . After the massage I was given some tea and biscuits again and also a free argan oil as a gift. The massage wasn't cheap at all, about €30, but i'd pay more for that! The only disadvantage - the place was a bit hard to find , it's better to ask somebody there. Definitely recommend it , would come back again! Total relaxation :)

Highly recommended!. Absolutely amazing experience! The entire treatment was very enjoyable and calming thanks to the expert, friendly staff and clean and relaxing facilities. The price is more than reasonable for the service provided and the staff were all polite and welcoming. Would absolutely go again and recommend to anyone staying in Marrakech!

What an experience!. We knew we wanted to try a Hammam since we have never seen anything like it. Boy were we in for a surprise! This place was super clean and the people couldn't have been more professional. We did a package that included the hammam and massage. It was excellent.

Best experience!. We found this Hammam through trip advisor and it exceeded our expectation! From the moment we arrived we were treated with genuine kindness. The entire staff was wonderful and very friendly! We chose the royal packaged that included the scrub, 1 hour massage, facial, and meal! Everything was exceptional and will recommend to all of our friends and family!

professional and skillful. we choose the one hour 4~hands massage and it felt great after a morning of exploring the medina. the massage strokes were firm and confident, and the ladies communicated in quiet whispers to ensure they coordinated their strokes well during the session. both masseuse were friendly, cheerful and discreet. the massage room was clean and tidy, and there was an attached shower room with shampoo and shower gel provided so that you could take a shower after the massage. overall, an enjoyable experience.

Worth the ratings. Having looked up the best place to receive a Hammam we decided to go with the reviews for here, and were not disappointed!We were a bit dubious as to the location, but one of their helpful staff came out and guided us to the spa. Once you have been there once you would have no problems finding it again.Excellent service from the start, we were served tea and biscuits while we waited for our team to prepare, who were all cheerful and professional.We went for their deal includng the hammam and massage, including facial, and then a meal. This was worth the price. The hammam was well performed in tranquility (We had been for a hammam a couple of days earlier and the ladies talked to each other all the way through our treatment) Then the massage where we were asked if we want light - hard. Suffering a bad back from the hotel bed, I opted for hard, today I woke up for the firsy time with no neck ache!
